abstract: In its first day of trading, Codexis, the biofuels maker backed by oil giant Royal Dutch Shell, fared better than most of the other firms debuting on the stock market Thursday, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: In its first day of trading, Codexis, the biofuels maker backed by oil giant Royal Dutch Shell, fared better than most of the other firms debuting on the stock market Thursday, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: In its first day of trading, Codexis, the biofuels maker backed by the oil giant Royal Dutch Shell, fared better than most of the other firms debuting on the stock market Thursday.

headline.main: Profitless Codexis Bumps Up Slightly in Debut
